name: Spamton NEO Retro Recreation
description:
Fight against Spamton NEO again in a familiar retro style, all on your browser!

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
Z / Enter - Confirm / Shoot!
F4 - Fullscreen

HEY! This project is open-source too!
[ HYPERLINK BLOCKED ]

Please support Toby Fox and the Deltarune team by buying the album!
https://tobyfox.bandcamp.com

♥ Lovingly made with the Godot engine.
